name: Reflector (Spelivink)
description:
You only have one plasmaball, use your trusty reflector and gravity generator to guide it to the button which opens the door to your escape. But watch out for the mutated Narpesians hunting you.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Raise or Lower Reflector

G - Throw Gravity Generator

Space - Launch Plasmaball from Plasma generator
